LanguageData.NoxiousHaze.description: Acidic smog is caused by pollution in nearby world tiles. It slows plant growth, deteriorates exposed items, and reduces mood.\n\nThe current world tile has a nearby pollution score of {NEARBYPOLLUTION}, calculated by adding up pollution of nearby world tiles. This means that, on average, acidic smog will occur every {MTB} days.
LanguageData.NoxiousHaze.label: მჟავე სმოგი
